commits.message: Fix typo to wrap up GUI-215
Pull in instance type choices for Create Alarm form.  GUI-215
Fix route in subnav on create scaling group policy page.  GUI-215
Allow a scaling group to be created from a given launch configuration’s detail page.  GUI-215
More progress on Create Alarm form.  GUI-215
Build tile view for scaling group instances and policies pages.  GUI-215
Fix typo in propagate flag for autoscale tag editor.  Add tooltip to “Propagate” label text.  GUI-215
Grr, tags for Scaling Groups are somewhat unique, so we’ll need a distinct tag editor.  GUI-215
Handle alarm creation from the Add Scaling Group Policy page.  GUI-215
Pull in availability zone choices for Create Alarm dialog.  GUI-215
Implement SmartRefresh(™) after marking an instance as unhealthy.  GUI-215
Move alarms outside the scope of a scaling group, since cloudwatch alarms are orthogonal to scaling groups.  GUI-215.
Initial progress on Create Alarm form.  GUI-215
Placeholder for scaling group policies page.  GUI-215
Avoid “flash of unstyled content” for avail zones multi-select widget.  GUI-215
Add health check type/period inputs to Scaling Group detail page.  Set IntegerField inputs to input type=“number”.  GUI-215
GUI-215: Include relevant text in Delete scaling group confirmation dialog when a scaling group has instances.
Select dimension based on metric namespace in Create Alarm dialog.  GUI-215
Add help text for alarm evaluation periods count and period length and set sane default values for both in Create Alarm form/dialog.  GUI-215
Convert Scaling Group Instances page to load instances via XHR.  GUI-215.
More progress on scaling group alarms page.  Allow alarm deletion.  GUI-215
Allow the default cooldown period to be modified from the scaling group detail page.  GUI-215
Allow modification of scaling group properties.  GUI-215
Set sand defaults for Create Alarm dialog if we know the scaling group.  GUI-215
More progress on Create Alarm dialog.  GUI-215
Use breadcrumbs for navigating up/down sections within a scaling group.  GUI-215
Move min/desired/max capacity fields to top of scaling group detail page form.  GUI-215
Remove remnant param to allow proper deletion of a scaling group policy.  Require POST for create/delete policy actions.  GUI-215
Placeholder for scaling group alarms page.  GUI-215
Ensure min capacity doesn’t exceed desired or max capacity on scaling group detail page.  GUI-215.
Allow updated tags to be saved for scaling groups.  GUI-215
Quick fix for Create Alarm dialog — better selection of volume dimension and value fields.  Fix typo.  GUI-215
Selectively display dimension value field based on the dimension (Instance, Volume, etc.) for Create Alarm dialog.  GUI-215
Properly attach a policy to an alarm.  GUI-215
Move Create Alarm dialog to scaling group policies page.  GUI-215
Allow load balancers to be modified for a scaling group.  GUI-215
Allow policy deletion from the scaling group policies page.  GUI-215
Add inline form field help text for default cooldown and health check period inputs on scaling group detail page.  GUI-215
Modify placeholder text for avail zone multi-select widget.  GUI-215
Initial progress on editing a scaling group.  GUI-215
Pass dimensions to create alarm handler, and allow redirect location to be configurable for the handler.  Display dimension value input field based on selected dimension type. GUI-215
Pull in scaling group and load balancer choices for Create Alarm form.  GUI-215
Allow an instance to be marked as unhealthy from the scaling group instances page.  GUI-215
Add unit field to Create Alarm form.  Try madlib-style entry for alarm trigger.  GUI-215
Build “Create Scaling Group Policy” form and dialog.  GUI-215
Allow termination policies to be updated on the scaling group detail page.  GUI-215
Allow one or more availability zones to be selected on the Scaling Group detail page, leveraging the “Chosen” multi-select widget.  GUI-215
Better name for metric namespace change handler.  GUI-215
More work to selectively display form fields on Create Alarm dialog.  GUI-215
More progress on metric choices for Create Alarm dialog.  GUI-215

Move Create Scaling Group Policy form to a page rather than a modal and move Create Alarm modal to that page since Foundation doesn’t support launching a modal from a modal (i.e. only one modal can be open at a time).  GUI-215
Shut down instances in a scaling group prior to deleting the scaling group.  Rework code to account for the fact that one or more policies are attached to an alarm, not vice-versa.  GUI-215
Build scaling group “Manage instances” page.  Link scaling group on instance detail page to scaling group detail page.  GUI-215
Better layout of min/desired/max capacities on scaling group detail page.  Properly save desired capacity.  GUI-215
